enterprises.description:
TeamPlayerHR is a revolutionary website tool that dramatically 
reduces the problem of bad hires and drives high performance 
team building for employers. It has been estimated that bad 
hires can cost $32,000 in recruitment fees, wasted wages, loss 
of productivity and time. It is further estimated that MDs 
waste up to 46% of their time on HR issues and that bad 
compatibility and fit mean that 86% of employees may be 
seeking new jobs in 2017. 
Self funded to date at approx. $450,000, we are seeking a next 
round of investment of $2M in order to realize our plans. The 
company is forecasting an EBITDA of $3.7M in Year 3. 
The Opportunity 
The Human Resources Talent Acquisition and Management 
market is changing as more and more companies look to 
technology solutions to help with the challenge of attracting and 
retaining individuals. Whilst other solution providers focus on 
attracting the best individuals, TeamPlayerHR places a unique 
focus on the selection (with statistically proven accuracy) of 
individuals who will work effectively alongside one another. The 
results can be used for maximizing employment, compatibility 
and productivity. 
Market Size: Market research by Towers Watson and Forbes 
indicates a 2014 market for talent management software to be 
at $3.2bn and growing at a rate of 17% per year. 
Competitors: Whilst there are no direct competitors to 
TeamPlayerHR, companies offering psychometric assessment 
solutions may claim to offer similar solutions. 
Competitive Advantage: As the first company to offer a solution 
that focuses on team compatibility, supported by patented 
technology, there is a very strong first mover advantage. In 
addition to direct B2B sales, there are multiple income streams 
to be exploited: 1) Bundling into solutions offered by the 
recruitment industry, 2) Establishing TeamPlayerHR ID as a B2C 
solution for inclusion into online business platforms (e.g. Linked 
In), 3) establishing a TeamPlayerHR job portal that embeds the ID 
into the process. 
Business Model: A highly scalable and efficient business that 
maximises the TeamPlayerHR web portal and online 
questionnaire. Aggressive Go to Market presence based on 
rapidly exploiting defined sales channels with ideal client 
profiles. Business model moves quickly from one-to-many, few-
to-many and onto many-to-many mass market. 
Company Milestones 
Proven Concept: TeamPlayerHR has successfully implemented 
and demonstrated the value to the California Public Medical 
Service, Resolve ,and to Social Media Apprenticeship program 
in the UK.

Diamond, due to its exceptional physical, electrical and thermal properties, has been considered as the ’holy grail’ of semiconductors capable of taking industries to the next level of performance. Advanced Diamondx Ltd (ADX). is an innovative company specialising in manufacturing synthetic diamonds and using them to coat  various materials, producing diamond-based tools and electronic devices . 
The application of ADX’s diamond manufacturing and coating processes include: improved heat dissipation for microprocessors enabling higher performance of electronics with lower energy demands; forming a protective layer to harden and sharpen manufacturing tools (such as drill bits or saw blades) enabling greater productivity and reduced costs.  ADX ‘s product is exploring/targeting a wide range of such markets with a combined size of multiple billions of dollars.
